document_data.name: Garos Daunger
document_data.mainbody: '''Garos Daunger''' was a chancellor of [[Hillsfar]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Hillsfar Reclaimed|9}}
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Garos attended the First Lord's [[Midsummer Masquerade]] ball.{{Cite adventurers league/Death on the Wall|17-18}}
document_data.Personality:
Garos was a shrewd politician willing to do anything to ensure the supremacy of the First Lord over the noble houses. He was very condescending, trying to always show his superiority.

He liked hunting.
